message: Hello Bob, I am offering you an exclusive opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I believe a price of $1,500,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?

I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and potential benefits to me.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  While I'm willing to negotiate, I value this product at a higher price point. Would you consider $1,350,000?
Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above $1,350,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $1,275,000. This is the highest I'm willing to go.
